original_text: Then Joseph told some of his servants to take Jacob's body. They knew how to put special oil on the body so that it would not become spoiled. Joseph's servants did what he told them to do.
korean_text: 그 수종 드는 의원에게 명하여 아버지의 몸을 향으로 처리하게 하매 의원이 이스라엘에게 그대로 하되

sentences.original_text: Then Joseph told some of his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 요셉은 그의 일부 종들에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: They knew how to put special oil on the body
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 시체에 특유를 바르는 방법을 알았다

sentences.original_text: so that it would not become spoiled
Joseph's servants did what he told them to do
sentences.korean_translation: 요셉의 종들은 그가 시킨 대로 했다
